name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Sauté onions, garlic, and ginger in a pan.
Add chicken and cook until browned.
Stir in tomatoes and curry powder, and cook for a few minutes.
Add coconut milk and simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Garnish with cilantro before serving.
substitutions: Use vegetable broth instead of coconut milk for a lighter option.
Replace chicken with tofu for a vegetarian version.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with basmati rice or naan bread.
Top with a dollop of yogurt for added creaminess.

name: Margarita Pizza
instructions: Preheat oven to 475°F (245°C).
Roll out pizza dough and spread tomato sauce over the top.
Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese.
Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until crust is golden and cheese is melted.
Top with fresh basil leaves and drizzle with olive oil.
Season with salt and black pepper.
substitutions: Use gluten-free pizza dough if needed.
Add additional toppings like mushrooms or peppers.
personalizedSuggestions: Pair with a side salad.
Add a sprinkle of Parmesan cheese for extra flavor.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet with taco seasoning.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Fill taco shells with cooked beef and top with lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese.
Serve with a dollop of sour cream.
substitutions: Ground beef can be substituted with ground turkey or tofu.
Taco shells can be replaced with lettuce wraps for a low-carb option.
personalizedSuggestions: Add a side of guacamole.
Top with fresh cilantro for extra flavor.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: Chop vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
Sauté garlic and onions in a pot.
Add carrots, celery, and potatoes, and cook for a few minutes.
Pour in vegetable broth and add tomatoes and bay leaves.
Simmer until vegetables are tender.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
substitutions: Add beans for extra protein.
Use chicken broth for a non-vegetarian option.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with a slice of crusty bread.
Add a sprinkle of fresh herbs.

name: Chicken Biryani
instructions: Marinate chicken with yogurt and spices.
Cook onions and tomatoes in a pot.
Add marinated chicken and cook until done.
In a separate pot, cook basmati rice.
Layer rice and chicken, and cook on low heat.
Garnish with cilantro and mint before serving.
substitutions: Use tofu for a vegetarian version.
Replace basmati rice with quinoa for a healthier option.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with raita or a side salad.
Top with fried onions for extra flavor.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add Caesar dressing and toss to coat.
Top with croutons and Parmesan cheese.
Sprinkle with lemon juice and black pepper.
substitutions: Use a different type of lettuce if preferred.
Replace Caesar dressing with a lighter vinaigrette.
personalizedSuggestions: Add grilled chicken for extra protein.
Serve with a slice of garlic bread.

name: Falafel Wrap
instructions: Warm pita bread in the oven.
Spread hummus inside pita.
Add falafel, cucumber, tomato, red onion, and lettuce.
Drizzle with tahini sauce and wrap up.
substitutions: Use gluten-free pita for a gluten-free option.
Replace falafel with grilled chicken for a non-vegetarian version.
personalizedSuggestions: Add pickles for extra flavor.
Serve with a side of tabbouleh.

name: Shrimp Scampi
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
Sauté garlic in butter until fragrant.
Add shrimp and cook until pink.
Pour in white wine and lemon juice, and simmer.
Toss in cooked pasta and garnish with parsley.
Season with salt and black pepper.
substitutions: Use vegetable broth instead of white wine.
Replace shrimp with chicken for a different protein.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with a side of garlic bread.
Top with extra Parmesan cheese.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomatoes, and red onion.
Combine with Kalamata olives and feta cheese.
Drizzle with olive oil and lemon juice.
Season with oregano, salt, and black pepper.
substitutions: Use vegan feta for a dairy-free version.
Add grilled chicken for extra protein.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with pita bread.
Add a sprinkle of fresh dill.

name: Teriyaki Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in teriyaki sauce, garlic, and ginger.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked through.
Serve with steamed rice.
Garnish with sesame seeds and green onions.
substitutions: Use tofu for a vegetarian option.
Replace teriyaki sauce with soy sauce for less sweetness.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with a side of steamed vegetables.
Add a sprinkle of sesame seeds for extra flavor.

name: Pancakes
instructions: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and salt.
In another bowl, combine milk, eggs, and melted butter.
Combine wet and dry ingredients.
Pour batter onto a hot griddle and cook until bubbles form.
Flip and cook until golden brown.
substitutions: Use almond milk for a dairy-free option.
Replace eggs with flax eggs for a vegan version.
personalizedSuggestions: Top with fresh fruit and maple syrup.
Add chocolate chips to the batter for extra indulgence.

name: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in warm water.
Stir-fry chicken and eggs in a pan.
Add soaked noodles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar.
Cook until noodles are tender.
Stir in bean sprouts and green onions.
Top with chopped peanuts and chili flakes.
substitutions: Use tofu instead of chicken for a vegetarian version.
Replace fish sauce with soy sauce for a vegan option.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve with lime wedges and extra peanuts.
Add a side of spring rolls.

name: Beef Stroganoff
instructions: Sauté beef in butter until browned.
Add onions and garlic, and cook until softened.
Stir in mushrooms and cook until tender.
Add flour and cook for a minute.
Pour in beef broth and bring to a simmer.
Stir in sour cream and Dijon mustard.
Season with salt and black pepper.
substitutions: Use chicken instead of beef for a lighter version.
Replace sour cream with Greek yogurt for a healthier option.
personalizedSuggestions: Serve over egg noodles or rice.
Top with fresh parsley for added flavor.
